summary.span: 使编译器可以将对象字段动态附加到托管对象。

span.span: Enables compilers to dynamically attach object fields to managed objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使语言编译器可以在运行时将任意属性附加到托管对象。The class enables language compilers to attach arbitrary properties to managed objects at run time. 一个对象是一个将托管的对象，由一个键，表示绑定到由一个值，表示其附加属性的字典。A object is a dictionary that binds a managed object, which is represented by a key, to its attached property, which is represented by a value. 对象的键是的单独实例`TKey`类向其附加属性，且其值分配给相应的对象的属性值。The object's keys are the individual instances of the `TKey` class to which the property is attached, and its values are the property values that are assigned to the corresponding objects. 密钥必须是唯一的;换而言之，类支持每个托管对象的一个附加的值。Keys must be unique; in other words, the class supports one attached value per managed object. 两个键是否相等，如果将它们传递给方法将返回`true`。Two keys are equal if passing them to the method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 您不能通过重写来控制相等性比较显式设置键的哈希代码。You cannot control equality comparisons by overriding to explicitly set the hash code for a key. 类不使用方法来计算哈希代码，并因此不会调用重写。The class does not use the method to compute hash codes, and therefore does not invoke overrides. 尽管类包含键/值对的集合，它最看作一个表而不是字典对象。Although the class holds a collection of key/value pairs, it is best thought of as a table rather than a dictionary object. 类不同于几种方式的字典：The class differs from a dictionary in several ways: - 它不会保留密钥。It does not persist keys. 它是一个键不保持活动状态只是因为它是集合的成员。That is, a key is not kept alive only because it is a member of the collection. - 它不包括所有方法 (如`GetEnumerator`或`Contains`) 通常具有一个字典。It does not include all the methods (such as `GetEnumerator` or `Contains`) that a dictionary typically has. - 它不实现接口。It does not implement the interface. 类不同于其密钥存储在集合中的对象生存期管理中的其他集合对象。The class differs from other collection objects in its management of the object lifetime of keys stored in the collection. 通常，当对象存储在集合中，其生存期内持续直到将会删除 （并且没有任何其他引用的对象） 或销毁的集合对象本身。Ordinarily, when an object is stored in a collection, its lifetime lasts until it is removed (and there are no additional references to the object) or until the collection object itself is destroyed. 但是，在类，将添加到表的键/值对不能确保，将会保留该密钥，即使它可以直接从存储 （例如，如果表包含一个键，A，V1 的值与表中的值已达到和第二个密钥，B，P2，其中包含一个引用值)。However, in the class, adding a key/value pair to the table does not ensure that the key will persist, even if it can be reached directly from a value stored in the table (for example, if the table contains one key, A, with a value V1, and a second key, B, with a value P2 that contains a reference to A). 相反，自动移除的键/值项，只要对密钥的任何其他引用存在于外部表。Instead, automatically removes the key/value entry as soon as no other references to a key exist outside the table. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个密钥存储在表外对它的引用被销毁后未保留表。The following example illustrates that a key stored in the table does not persist after references to it outside the table are destroyed. 该示例定义两个类： `ManagedClass`，它表示表中的键和`ClassData`，它表示密钥的值。The example defines two classes: `ManagedClass`, which represents the key in the table, and `ClassData`, which represents the key's value. 该示例实例化每种类型的三个的对象。The example instantiates three objects of each type. 它还实例化对象，表示第二个`ManagedClass`，然后再销毁第二个`ManagedClass`实例。It also instantiates a object that represents the second `ManagedClass`, and then destroys the second `ManagedClass` instance. 尝试检索第二个`ManagedClass`对象从属性指示对该对象没有引用保持状态。The attempt to retrieve the second `ManagedClass` object from the property indicates that no references to the object remain. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

span.span: Instances of the class are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 它们不需要调用方执行任何额外的锁定。

span.span: They do not require callers to do any additional locking.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数实例化一个空表; 也就是说，表包含任何键/值对。The constructor instantiates an empty table; that is, the table contains no key/value pairs. 可以通过调用添加键/值对， ，或方法。You can add key/value pairs by calling the , , or method. 中的所有密钥对象必须是唯一的。Every key in a object must be unique. 键不唯一，如果它们是指同一对象 (即，如果将它们作为参数传递方法将返回`true`)。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`).

Public Sub Add (key As TKey, value As TValue)
public: void Add(TKey key, TValue value);

param.name: key

span.span: The key to add.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.
The key's property value.
Adds a key to the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的所有密钥对象必须是唯一的。Every key in a object must be unique. 键不唯一，如果它们是指同一对象 (即，如果将它们作为参数传递方法将返回`true`)。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`). 如果密钥在加法运算期间是垃圾回收，删除现有的键/值对，并不会引发异常的情况下添加新的键/值对。If the key is garbage-collected during the addition operation, the existing key/value pair is removed and the new key/value pair is added without an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`MainClass`类和一个`MainInfo`类，该类提供以下信息`MainClass`实例。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 该示例然后调用方法中添加`MainClass`对象和其附加`MainInfo`对象传递给表。The example then calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示如何调用并方法来将键/值对添加到表，以及方法来检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 确保垃圾回收器回收 对象时释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垃圾回收器调用何时可以完成而当前对象。The garbage collector calls when the current object is ready to be finalized.

Public Function GetOrCreateValue (key As TKey) As TValue

param.name: key

span.span: The key to search for.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.

summary.span: 以原子方式在表中搜索指定键，并返回对应的值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果表中不存在该键，此方法将调用表示表值的类的默认构造函数，以创建绑定到指定键的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes the default constructor of the class that represents the table's value to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果表中已存在 ，则为对应于 的值；否则为 范型类型参数定义的类的默认构造函数创建的新值。

span.span: The value that corresponds to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, a new value created by the default constructor of the class defined by the generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`不存在在表中，该方法将其添加，以及通过调用定义的类的默认构造函数实例化的对象`TValue`泛型类型参数。If `key` does not exist in the table, the method adds it, along with the object that is instantiated by calling the default constructor of the class defined by the `TValue` generic type parameter. 如果`TValue`类具有没有默认构造函数，引发。If the `TValue` class has no default constructor, a is thrown. 这是检索的现有值或添加到一个新值的建议的方法如果表的值的类定义一个默认构造函数。This is the recommended method of retrieving an existing value or adding a new value to the table if the class of the table's value defines a default constructor. 如果它没有定义默认构造函数，则可以改为调用方法，它依赖于提供回调方法实例化表示表的值的对象If it does not define a default constructor, you can instead call the method, which relies on a callback-provided method to instantiate the object representing the table's value 若要检索现有键的值，而不添加键/值对，如果在表中，找不到键调用方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`MainClass`类和一个`MainInfo`类，该类提供以下信息`MainClass`实例。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 此示例调用方法中添加`MainClass`对象和其附加`MainInfo`对象传递给表。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示如何调用并方法来将键/值对添加到表，以及方法来检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

para.span: 在适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET 或可移植类库中，改为捕获基类异常 。

span.span: In the .NET for Windows Store apps or the Portable Class Library, catch the base class exception, , instead.

exception.span: 表示表中值的类未定义默认构造函数。

span.span: The class that represents the table's value does not define a default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !TValue GetValue(!TKey key, class System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable`2/CreateValueCallback<!TKey, !TValue> createValueCallback) cil managed
public: TValue GetValue(TKey key, System::Runtime::CompilerServices::ConditionalWeakTable<TKey, TValue>::CreateValueCallback ^ createValueCallback);

param.name: key

span.span: The key to search for.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.

param.name: createValueCallback
param.span: 可以为给定 创建值的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate to a method that can create a value for the given .

param.span: 它只有一个 TKey 类型的参数，并返回一个 TValue 类型的值。

span.span: It has a single parameter of type TKey, and returns a value of type TValue.

summary.span: 以原子方式在表中搜索指定键，并返回对应的值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果表中不存在该键，此方法将调用一个回调方法来创建绑定到指定键的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes a callback method to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果表中已存在 ，则为附加到 的值；否则为 委托返回的新值。

span.span: The value attached to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, the new value returned by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`表中不存在调用方法定义的`createValueCallback`参数并将其传递该密钥。If `key` does not exist in the table, invokes the method that is defined by the `createValueCallback` parameter and passes it the key. 新值为绑定到表中的键，并作为结果返回。A new value is bound to the key in the table and returned as a result. 仅在表示表的值的类未定义默认构造函数时，请使用此方法。Use this method only when the class that represents the table's value does not define a default constructor. 如果定义了默认构造函数，使用方法相反。If it does define a default constructor, use the method instead. 若要检索现有键的值，而不添加键/值对，如果在表中，找不到键调用方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. 如果多个线程尝试创建同一个键，`createValueCallback`可能在多次调用使用相同的密钥。If multiple threads try to create the same key, `createValueCallback` may be invoked multiple times with the same key. 只有一个这些调用将成功，并且其返回的值将添加到表。Only one of these calls will succeed, and its returned value will be added to the table. 哪个线程成功的值是不确定。Which thread succeeds in creating the value is indeterminate. 此规则允许要调用的表`createValueCallback`之外的内部表锁，以防止死锁。This rule permits the table to invoke `createValueCallback` outside the internal table lock to prevent deadlocks. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`MainClass`类和一个`MainInfo`类，该类提供以下信息`MainClass`实例。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 它还定义一个静态 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`CreateAttachedValue`方法，可以分配给委托，并传递给方法。It also defines a static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `CreateAttachedValue` method that can be assigned to the delegate and passed to the method. 此示例调用方法中添加`MainClass`对象和其附加`MainInfo`对象传递给表。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示如何调用并方法来将键/值对添加到表，以及方法来检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

if is found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果密钥是垃圾回收在执行此操作，该方法可能返回`false`并设置`value`为默认值 （如同键不存在）。If the key is garbage-collected during this operation, the method may return `false` and set `value` to the default value (as if the key were not present). ## Examples 下面的示例定义`MainClass`类和一个`MainInfo`类，该类提供以下信息`MainClass`实例。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 此示例调用， ，并方法添加到的键/值对表。The example calls the , , and methods to add key/value pairs to a table. 每种情况下，该示例调用方法来确认已将键/值对添加到表。In each case, the example calls the method to confirm that the key/value pair has been added to the table.
